stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  AMAZING LECTURES  CARING
comments: Marcelo is a really good professor and he present the material in a very organized manner. Most of the lectures are made up of slides but he does in class examples on the board and makes up questions on the spot to keep things interesting. His tests can be challenging but if you do all his practice questions the tests are really easy. Great prof!

comments: Great prof. Go to class. He\'s available even after office hours. Responds to emails within one business day. Genuinely wants to see you succeed. Read the textbook, do the problem sets, and go to his office hours and you will do well.

comments: Dr. Arbex is very straight foreword, his notes follow the textbook and he assigns problems that our used on the exam. He also posted past exams on CLEW so students can practice. His exams are all problems, no MC so you got to know your stuff.
